name: component-barcode-scanner
description: Camera-based barcode and QR code scanner using BarcodeDetector API
postMessage: Import and use: import { BarcodeScanner } from './components/component-barcode-scanner/BarcodeScanner'; <BarcodeScanner onScan={result => console.log(result.rawValue)} />. Note: BarcodeDetector API requires Chrome/Edge. For cross-browser support, add a polyfill.
